channel.title: OpenGLES Acceleration for Deep Learning Blog
channel.description: OpenGLES Acceleration for Deep Learning Blog

item.title: Welcome
item.description: Hello everyone. I am Pratham Deshmukh,a 3rd year engineering student at VJTI,Mumbai India. This GSoc 2023, I will be working under the estimeed organisation beagleboard.org foundation and collaborating with my incredible project mentors, Deepak Khatri,Shreyas Atre,Vedant Paranjape and Kumar Abhishek.

item.title: About the project
item.description: Aim: Current acceleration on the beagleboard AI-64 focuses on using the EVE and DSP hardware blocks. The SoC on those boards also feature an OpenGLES enabled GPU. The goal with this is to utilize shaders to perform computations. A possible frame work to utilize this on is the Darknet CNN framework.
